data.name: Stoneshard
data.detailed_description:
Stoneshard is a turn-based Roguelike / RPG with elements of survival and strategy.

You are an ordinary mortal, who happened to be in the middle of a fight for a land of scattered city-states. Several forces have locked horns in the combat for these once prosperous lands. Indigenous inhabitants humans stand for their homeland; suddenly returned Last King is eager to take back the royal throne; orcs launched the invasion to flee from inevitable elimination; and elves are interested to carry on their a bit illegal trade.

Set off on a perilous journey across the procedurally generated world, while various followers flock under your banners. You will have to face not only hundreds of foes but also pain, hunger, fear and internal disputes. Put an end to the protracted war or plunge the country into even deeper chaos.


  • Two-Layered Gameplay

    Travel across the global map as a part of your own caravan and descend into dungeons alone.

  • Caravan

    Develop it, find new allies and persuade them to join you. Keep up the loyalty and solve conflicts: followers interact differently with character and among themselves.

  • In-depth Health System

    Besides the death from damage there are other ways to die. Struggle against hunger, thirst, intoxication, pain, injuries, fear and insanity.

  • Role Playing System

    Develop dozens of attributes, learn plenty of new skills, obtain habits, bents and phobias.

  • Combat System

    Try the vast arsenal of hundreds types of weaponry, equipment and consumables. Take part in an honest combat, kill stealthily or cast the might of spells upon the enemies.

  • Pantheon

    Keep in balance between several rival deities or choose one patron. Get terrifying might for even more terrifying price.

  • Reasonable Permadeath

    Character has only one try. But his death doesn't mean the end of the game - take control over another character, thus saving part of a previous progress.
